name: Scyphozoan
description:
>Woah! 

>You're a jellyfish now, but really that isn't that big of a deal. 

>You've got bigger fish on your mind tonight. (and phytoplankton)

----------

Note from Brio!:

This game deals with light themes of social anxiety, self worth and self image.

Scyphozoan is  my first attempt at a complete game, although I keep it as a in development incase I have any new ideas to add or find mistakes.

the little songs I made in the game engines "tunes" are what I'm most proud of, as well as the secret rooms.

I am interested in continuing this idea, as I learn more about how to use Bitsy and general game design. Any feedback/ constructive criticism is greatly appreciated! 

----------

Credits

Music, art and programming by: Brio!

made with Bitsy

Ver. 1.3.1
